title: Best Pork Pie
ingredients: ['900g minced pork', '2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh rosemary', '100g breadcrumbs', '180g Italian sausage or salami, chopped', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 large onion, grated or finely minced', 'salt', 'ground black pepper', '40g grated Parmesan cheese', '1 (425g) packet with 2 pre-rolled shortcrust pastry sheets']
